That's strange, I would expect the option `linealpha` or `linewidth` to be it, but seems like not...

Though I know it is not always possible, if you can change your input to be of the form (x::Vector, y::Vector, z::Matrix) the surface will be more accurate and won't draw the edges.
eg
```x, y = 1:10, 1:20
z = [sin(xi)+cos(yi) for yi in y, xi in x]
surface(x, y, z, leg=false, camera=(50,60))```
